segments.text: Have you ever been involved in the auditing work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have . I was employed by the financial section of the university ever since I graduated . I worked there for 3 years . Then I had worked in a bank for 3 years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long did it take you to become an auditor ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very short time . I became an auditor within three months .
segments.speaker: S2
